alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 10:29AM CDT until June 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. For the Mississippi at Aitkin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Aitkin. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, The boat ramp at Aitkin city park floods. A few driveways become covered with water in the Cedarbrook area. Minor flooding of farmland occurs in the Cedarbrook community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Monday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.6 feet on 04/29/1966. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Aitkin 13.0 13.6 Mon 9 am CDT 13.5 13.4 13.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Tuesday late morning.
